person.persName: Lewis Richardson (Covington, Kentucky, teacher, soldier, and justice of the peace)

body.p: Covington, Kentucky, teacher, soldier, and justice of the peace. Kentucky native. Married to Atlantic O. Richardson. School teacher in Covington in 1860. Private and ambulance driver in the 23rd Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment from January 1862 to November 1863. In a convalescent camp at Chattanooga, Tennessee, from November 1863 to February 1865. Justice of the peace for the 1st District of Kenton County in 1865.
